results.title: Live Every Moment | Sublimation Transfer
results.description:
This is a sublimation transfer and you must have a heat press to apply.

Application Recommendations:

Set heat temperature to 385 degrees Fahrenheit.
Place shirt on heat press.
I recommend putting a piece of Kraft paper in the middle of the shirt to avoid bleeding.
It is also recommended to use a shirt that is 100% polyester, however you can use a 65% polyester shirt but the color will not be as vibrant and may fade.
The fabric should be white or light colored.
Place transfer face down on the shirt.
Press for 60-85 seconds at low-medium pressure. {This is dependent on material}
Remove paper and transfer immediately.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

Color may vary due to screen resolutions and displays.

All measurements are approximate and will be sized according to the design.

NO DIGITAL FILE INCLUDED
TRANSFER ONLY - NO GARMENTS INCLUDED

results.title: Live, Love, Laugh Shirt, Inspirational TShirt, TShirt for Women, Women TShirt, Women Shirts, Shirts, Custom Shirt, Tshirt
results.description:
Live Love & Laugh Shirt, Live Love Laugh Shirt, Inspirational Shirt, Encouragement Shirt, Graphic Tees, Graphic Tees for Women, Women TShirt, Shirts, Women Shirts, Fun Custom Shirt, Women Custom Shirt, Custom Shirts for Women, Men Custom Shirts, Custom Shirts for Men, Unisex Custom Shirts, Fun Graphic Shirts, Graphic Tees for Men, Men's TShirt, Men Shirts, Custom Shirt, Shirt, Fun Saying Shirts, Tshirt

Encouragement and enlightenment go hand in hand.  Say so with one of these Live Love and Laugh shirts! 
 These super soft, Unisex shirts are comfy and ready to wear!  All shirts are custom made to order for your special occasion, family function, entrepreneurial exploits, adventures, or just fun-loving personality!  If you don’t see a color shirt you desire, or would like to know if you can get the font in another color, please message us and we will work to get you the perfect shirt you crave!

Please Take Care:

Shirts should be washed in Cool water temperatures with gentle detergent for a longer last.  Always dry with low or no heat.

Do Not Bleach

Do Not Iron directly over vinyl as it will adhere to your hot iron.


How Will You Get It:

All shirts are made to order, so we ask for 3-5 days to prepare and ship items to you via USPS.  All items shipped through USPS will have tracking information for you to follow your package through to delivery.  Once items have been shipped, we no longer have any control over your item and therefore are not responsible for lost or stolen items.

If your item is being delivered internationally, you are responsible for all customs or taxes incurred for shipping.  International items are not on a guaranteed delivery time, so if you require your item by a certain date/time please be sure to place your order with delivery times in mind.


IMPORTANT:

Due to items being made to order, all sales are final.  Please reach out to us if you have questions about colors, sizes, or designs prior to placing your order.  We respond within 24 hours of receiving your message, so please contact us with all questions or concerns to ensure you are ordering exactly what you want.  Your satisfaction is very important to us!

results.title: Live Laugh Love Bedroom Wall Decor, Master Bedroom Decal, Bedroom Wall Art, Inspirational decor, Wooden Connected Words, Gallery Wall Decor
results.description:
This wooden word comes unfinished and unpainted. Each is individually cut and is available in a variety of sizes ranging from 3 inches long to 42 inches long. You can hand paint, spray paint, decoupage, mod podge or apply any other type of surface treatment to the word!

SIZES/THICKNESS-
All items are laser cut (edges will be dark) from cabinet grade MDF. This method delivers the very best resolution and quality of cut.
1/8 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 16 inches Long
1/4 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 18 inches Long
3/8 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 42 inches Long
1/2 inch Material Thickness Is Available for Sizes up to 42 inches Long

WHY BUY FROM US?
- everything in our store ships FREE
- orders ship out the same business day or the next business day
- hassle free return policy
- we use strong and beautiful wood
- all products are laser cut - best possible quality with no sanding!
- everything made in the USA by a family

REVIEWS-
We know how important reviews are when purchasing online. Since we just opened this shop we don't have many reviews yet. We want you to be confident in your purchase. Please feel free to look at the reviews from our other etsy shop (Buildeez) until this shop (CrazyCutouts) gets more of its own: https://www.etsy.com/your/shops/Buildeez/reviews?ref=seller_platform_hdr 

HOW TO HANG THEM- 
For small to medium sized letters: double sided foam mounting tape works great. Hot gluing ribbon to the back and then hang it on a nail. You can use dots of hot glue on the back of the letter and adhere it directly to the surface you are hanging it on.
For the larger letters: it is good to use liquid nails if you want to permanently attach it to a surface. Or, you can also use sawtooth hanging hardware that can be found at any local hardware store. 

DON'T SEE WHAT YOU NEED?
Try our sister shop: https://www.etsy.com/shop/Buildeez?ref=hdr_shop_menu
Or convo us with any custom orders!

results.title: Yoga Girl Meditation Girl Watercolor Art, Today is a Good Day Motivational Quotes Canvas Print
results.description:
💕 PRODUCT INFORMATION
Gallery quality canvas print displays vibrant artwork that is built to last. Printed with HP Latex Inks that are fade resistant. Inks are water based and solvent free so rest assured there are no harsh chemicals in your home. Assembled with 3/4" thick wood frame and glued wood core stretcher bars.

All canvas prints are wrapped and shipped in fitted packaging
• Ready To Hang - Mounting hardware comes attached.
• Leveling Bumpers Included - For wall protection.
• Semi-Gloss Print - Increased vibrancy of artwork.
• Beveled Wood Stretch Bars - Make frame less noticeable on front of canvas.
• Industrial Strength Staples - Ensure a tight fit that is sure to last.

💕  How do I take care of returns, exchanges or product issue? 💕 
💕 TRACKING SHOWS ARRIVED
There’s not a whole lot we can do when the tracking info shows it as being delivered. Please check with everyone in your household as someone else might have brought it in. Sometimes we have heard of a package going to a neighbor mistakenly or being left at a different/side door. In our experience, usually the package is located.
Most orders are shipped via UPS Mail Innovations or UPS Surepost, and final delivery is by the USPS so we also suggest having the customer contact their local post office and many times they can get in touch with the actual person who delivered it and see if they recall where they left it. It’s best to do that soon after it’s marked as delivered.
💕 NO TRACKING OR NO MOVEMENT
If a package does not show any movement and has passed the allotted time for delivery we will send a new package at our cost to the customer.  We may ask you to check to very the address or supply us with a new shipping address.
SIZING EXCHANGE
We don't offer exchanges or refunds in those situations.
💕 PRODUCT ISSUE
If it is an issue on our end where we sent out the wrong product, wrong size, bad graphic just send us a picture of what you have  received for quality control purposes and we can offer a refund or replacement once the issue is deemed our fault.
US customers have up to 30 days after the shipped date and international customers have up to 60 days after the shipped date.
What we need to make a replacement order:
1.	Please provide the name and email.
2.	Please provide the order number.
3.	Please provide picture of wrong/ damaged item And Shipping Label.
Once we receive this we will print a replacement product and send it right out!

results.title: All You Need is Love and Prosecco Quote, Vinyl Wall Art Sticker Decal Mural, Bedroom, Lounge. Home, Wall Decor
results.description:
All You Need is Love and Prosecco Quote - Matt Vinyl Wall Art Sticker Decal Mural.

16 colours to choose from, see picture on this listing.

This Vinyl Wall Art Sticker Decal measures total dimensions. 3 x sizes available:

40cm wide x 27.6cm high, 60cm wide x 41.4cm high & 80cm wide by 55.3cm high.

We strongly suggest measuring out the dimensions on your wall space prior to ordering so as to properly gauge the finished size of the sticker

16 COLOURS TO CHOOSE FROM – See the pictures for colour options
_________________________________

WHY OUR WALL ART DECALS ARE SO SPECIAL:

1) Each decal is made of high quality, self-adhesive waterproof vinyl. 

2) Each of our products is quality checked before being sent to you and contains its very own authentic quality mark, the Fabulous Stickers quality seal of approval.

3) All orders come with a FREE GIFT!

4) Your wall art sticker comes complete with a FREE test sticker so you can try before you apply your chosen design.

5) Full written and pictorial instructions are included.

WHAT SURFACES ARE SUITABLE FOR VINYL WALL ART STICKER DECALS?

Decals can be applied to any clean, smooth and flat surface. Put them on your walls painted walls (matt, vinyl and gloss), doors, wardrobes, windows, mirrors, cars and metal surfaces - anywhere you want! 

WHY DECALS?

They are much faster, cleaner and easier than painting, the cost effective way to re-decorate a room or hallway in a few short minutes!

Why not use various decals and colors to create a unique design! 

SHIPPING:

Orders ship within 48 hours of receipt of payment. 

Allow 3-5 business days for delivery via 1st Class Royal Mail for domestic orders in the UK

We ship worldwide from the UK

PAYMENT:

Please remit payment within 3 days of ordering. 

We accept PayPal, Pay Pal also accepts all major credit cards. 

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS:

Our vinyl wall art decals are easy and fun to install. 
Complete and simple step-by-step instructions are included with your order.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

We can custom size most designs to your specifications. 
Please contact us for an estimate. 

We can also create custom word art (for example - favourite phrases, names, Bible verses, etc.) Message us for more information.

We have a 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If, for any reason, you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return any unused vinyl wall art sticker decals to us within 7 days of purchase for a full refund of the purchase price (less shipping). 

Enjoy your new vinyl wall decals.  Thank you for choosing Fabulous Stickers!

results.title: KEEPSAKE NECKLACE, Jewelry, Family Jewelry, mother gift, daughter gift, Sister Gift, Live Laugh Love, under 30 dollars, Hypoallergenic
results.description:
I Love My Dog Jewelry® » made with love » be part of a good cause » with each sale, a contribution is made to charity.

Small things add up. Small things make bigger things. Small things create ripples.  You don’t need to do something huge to make a positive difference in the world.

You may choose your chain length (up to 30 inches) 
Add a complimentary pearl, crystal or stone of your choice, be sure to let me know what color you prefer.
Not sure? Measure a favorite necklace you have end to end to choose your perfect length.

►PENDANT
Stainless Steel
Measurements: 3/4" x 7/8" or 19mm x 22mm
High-quality stainless steel polished on both sides. 
Hypoallergenic and will not tarnish.

Necklace Length Position on the Body based on the average size woman

10 to 14 inches - Wraps closely around the neck
16 inches - Wraps loosely around the neck
18 inches - Sits on the collarbone
20 inches - Sits just below the collarbone
22 inches - Lays at or above the top of the bust
24 inches - Lays at or just below the center of the bust
28 to 30 inches - Hangs below the bust

Please note: A sample necklace is being used in these photos. The necklace you receive will, of course, be completely brand new, and have never been worn. Each item is handmade and may vary slightly. 

To reduce waste, multiple items may be wrapped together. If you would like items individually wrapped, please leave a note in Message to Seller during checkout. 

"I create stylish jewelry that I personally wear every day." I love to create jewelry that is very simple, delicate and feminine. My designs strike a perfect balance between professional, creative, formal and comfortable. Handmade for you, by me, Robyn, at I Love My Dog Jewelry. 

IS THIS A GIFT?
Okay, so you need a gift? I'm here to help. I would like to help make gift giving a little easier on you, and it’s always a good time to treat yourself.  I'm happy to ship to another address! Just send me a note at checkout that can be included with your purchase instead of a receipt so that they know its from you! Let me know if you would like it gift wrapped as well.

CUSTOM ORDERS:
Love this design, but need different colors or stones? I can accommodate most custom orders! Just send me a message and I will set up a custom listing for you.  So many styles and looks to choose from. Most of my jewelry can be customized; if you see something you like but want some changes made, just ask and I'll do my best to accommodate you. If you don't see what you're looking for, please send me a message on Etsy I would be more than happy to work with you.

ANIMAL RESCUE:
Feel good knowing that someone besides you benefits from your jewelry purchase... Look great and make a difference. Jewelry that you will wear today, tomorrow and next year. I create classic pieces for women to wear every day. Jewelry that has personal meaning to me and isn't just a fad or trend.   Feel great about what you are wearing while sending some good karma out into the world. My jewelry has a purpose beyond the creation of beautiful adornments. I believe in the power of gratitude and giving and I love creating for the benefit of animals. I am a volunteer rescue worker. I work with some very wonderful groups that drive rescue pets to their new homes.   Like you, I love animals. Like you, I want to help animals. My jewelry sales improve the lives of homeless and abused animals through sheltering, adoption, education and advocacy, as well as the prevention of animal cruelty. Always remember when you are wearing my beautiful jewelry you are helping a beautiful creature. You can feel good knowing that someone besides you benefits from your purchase... Look great and make a difference.

Beautiful and Thoughtful Gifts for Women.
Styles include: Bangle Charm Bracelets, Earrings and Necklaces.
Fast shipping. Great service. 
Look great while doing good.
Simple and clean styles.
Stylish Jewelry For A Good Cause. 

All jewelry is MADE IN THE USA and is created in a totally smoke-free environment.



I create jewelry that I personally wear every day.
New items are added weekly, so be sure to stop by again soon! Thank you for visiting my shop and have a wonderful day. 

Please introduce me to your friends and family, take a photo and tag yourself wearing your jewelry by using the links below.

BLOG: 
https://ilovemydogjewelry.wordpress.com/
FACEBOOK: 
www.facebook.com/jewelryforagoodcause 
TWITTER: 
https://twitter.com/ROBYNKEARNS 
INSTAGRAM: 
http://instagram.com/ilovemydogjewelry 
PINTEREST: 
http://www.pinterest.com/robynkearns68
TUMBLR: 
http://robynkearns68.tumblr.com/
WE♥IT: 
https://weheartit.com/ilovemydogjewelry


Click on the link below to see some of my many wonderful animal rescues: https://www.pinterest.com/robynkearns68/my-rescue-work-that-i-love/

You're sure to find the perfect gift for someone you love (or yourself). Jewelry with a purpose that will put a smile on your face while making the world a better place.

Feel free to contact me anytime, I love hearing from you!

Oh and yes, I love kitty cats too.
♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ 
Robyn

………………………….………………………


HANDMADE with LOVE
All of my jewelry is created with special care in my studio in New York (USA)

PLEASE ENTER MY SHOP HERE: www.etsy.com/shop/IloveMyDogJewelry

JEWELRY CARE:
As with all handmade items, my items are delicate, so please treat with care. To prolong the life of your piece, please avoid contact with heavy perfumes. Like all jewelry, your jewelry should be handled carefully. Never subject to chlorine, silver dips, chemical solutions or ultrasonic cleaners, as these substances can cause the natural gemstones and metals to discolor. 

ALWAYS REMOVE all jewelry before showering, swimming, exercising. Always store in a dry airtight bag when not wearing.  As with all silver and brass, it WILL form a patina/darken over time, easily brighten sterling silver with a silver polishing cloth (clean VERY gently), and brass pieces with brass cleaner.

results.description:
Live, laugh, love, inspirational sign, modern chic decor, rustic decor, housewarming gift, wedding anniversary present, personalize yours.

Finished size without frame: 11" x 11"       
Finished size with frame: 13,5" x 13,5"

The wood sign is painted (or stained), framed and a clear coat finish is applied. When you choose a color, this will be the background color. If you choose the option color, put your color choice in the personalization section. You can message me so we can work together to find the perfect color choice for you!

Our signs are made from real wood and individually hand-painted, no MDF or vinyl used here ... quality and customer service is our number #1 priority. Signs without a frame are made in pine and the ones with frame are Baltic birch plywood.

We don't try to hide wood defects as we feel like it gives character to the signs and other wood items that we make and it gives the rustic look that we want for our products.

There is a sawtooth hanger on the back ready for hanging.

Our goal is for you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you are not satisfied, we will do everything within our power to make it right. To that end, please help us by reading the item description and size carefully, contacting us with any questions, needs, or concerns, and checking that all contact information and addresses are accurate prior to place your order.

Please contact us for international shipping rates.

Thank you for visiting our shop and we look forward to working with you!


Purchasing Instructions for a personalized sign:  We can easily add names or dates to your sign. Send me your request in the personalized section and we will make you the best sign ever!
